name: Star Circle: SCB (Playable Build)
description:
Blast off to a UNIVERSE OF WONDER. Full of WORMHOLES, ALIENS, PUZZLES, SECRET MILITARY BASES, ORIGINAL MUSIC, AND MORE!

Inspired by a much-loved Sci-Fi TV Show from the 1990s and 2000s, and the adventure games of the 1980s and 1990s.

The game is about 50% complete now, but you can play what I have so far. It may break or stop before you're done, but I am working on it daily and should have it finished by New Years Day, 2022 (just around the corner!).

To be honest, I just wanted to get this posted before the Lost Cartridge GameJam ended.

It's the first game I've made, along with my son (who is also a big Stargate fan), and I don't really know my way around itch, so apologies if I'm not doing this right!

Music, Art, etc. by LAMS. Characters and story based upon Stargate SG-1, by MGM.
